name: The Relationship
description: A 90-minute Valentine's Day ride that takes you through the stages of a relationship - from first impressions to commitment. Each section builds on the last with motivational coaching cues woven throughout.

sequence.name: First Impressions
sequence.notes: Like any good relationship, we start with getting to know each other

sequence.name: First Impressions
sequence.notes: Sometimes the best things start simple - just showing up is enough

sequence.name: Getting to Know You
sequence.notes: Building connection, discovering what works together

sequence.name: Getting to Know You
sequence.notes: Every conversation reveals something new - stay curious, stay open

sequence.name: Getting to Know You
sequence.notes: Finding your rhythm together takes time, but it's worth it

sequence.name: Getting to Know You
sequence.notes: This is where you learn what makes each other smile

sequence.name: Butterflies
sequence.notes: That exciting feeling when things start to click

sequence.name: Butterflies
sequence.notes: Your heart races a little faster when something special is beginning

sequence.name: Butterflies
sequence.notes: These moments of anticipation - they're what make it all feel electric

sequence.name: Butterflies
sequence.notes: Embrace the nervousness - it means you care

sequence.name: The Pause
sequence.notes: Take a breath - not every moment needs to be intense to be meaningful

sequence.name: The Foundation
sequence.notes: Every strong relationship needs a solid base

sequence.name: The Foundation
sequence.notes: This is where trust builds - steady, reliable, consistent

sequence.name: The Foundation
sequence.notes: Real love isn't just the fireworks - it's showing up on ordinary days

sequence.name: The Foundation
sequence.notes: OOS - You're building something that can weather any storm

sequence.name: The Doubt
sequence.notes: Even strong foundations get tested - but you don't give up, you recover and come back stronger

sequence.name: Growing Together
sequence.notes: Relationships evolve through challenges

sequence.name: Growing Together
sequence.notes: The work that makes you stronger as a pair

sequence.name: Growing Together
sequence.notes: Growth isn't always comfortable, but that's how you become better together

sequence.name: The Setback
sequence.notes: Sometimes you take a step back to move forward - that's not failure, that's wisdom

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: The highs that make it all worthwhile

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: When you push each other to be your best

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: This is the fire that keeps everything alive

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: Love isn't always easy, but it's always worth fighting for

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: These are the moments you'll remember - when you gave everything

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: Feel your heart pounding - that's what being fully alive feels like

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: You're capable of more than you think, especially when you're not alone

sequence.name: The Passionate Peaks
sequence.notes: Match that effort - show yourself what you're made of

sequence.name: The Comedown
sequence.notes: You can't stay at the peak forever - learning to rest together is just as important as climbing together

sequence.name: Better Together
sequence.notes: The power of partnership - paired intervals

sequence.name: Better Together
sequence.notes: Two hearts beating as one - we rise and fall together

sequence.name: Better Together
sequence.notes: You're stronger because you're not doing this alone - feel the energy of everyone here

sequence.name: Better Together
sequence.notes: There's power in partnership - lean into it

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: The long haul - endurance and dedication

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: Love is a choice you make over and over again - choose to keep going

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: The long road is where you prove what matters most

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: Showing up, day after day, that's what makes it real

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: This is where forever is built - one pedal stroke at a time

sequence.name: Commitment
sequence.notes: Commitment means staying when it gets hard - and you're still here

sequence.name: Gratitude
sequence.notes: Appreciate what your body just did, and everyone who rode alongside you today
